blog.name: mybabyshuri
blog.title: I just want to love my fandom, ok?
blog.description: Shuri is my spirit animal, Okoye is my queen

tags: I need someone to write this
body:
Ok, so

I was watching Annie (the black version) and if you’ve ever seen it I think you can totally understand when I say the ENTIRE movie all I pictured was Tony Stark (like before Avengers) as Oliver Warbucks and Pepper Potts (when she was still his assistant) as Grace. Like egotistical and filthy rich Tony meets this foster girl one day and saves her life after she was running in the street and ends up taking her in to better his image with the press. He’d reluctantly let her into his lab, but be pleasantly surprised by the natural gift she has for mechanics and soon she’s always in the lab with him working on projects and he’d work on building her a suit, and after a while of spending time with her he begins to love her like she’s his own, all the while falling in love with Pepper. Then he decides to help her find her real parents, but while doing that and getting no results ends up wanting to adopt her, but then these “fake” parents come out of the blue and he’s just heart broken at the thought of losing her, but understands that its best for her and its what she’s always wanted. So he lets her go, depressed, only to beat himself up when he finds out they weren’t really her parents and goes badass Iron Man to find her and get her back, with the help of Pepper, Rhodey, and Happy. And they finally find her and he beats the fake parents asses before asking the foster girl if he can adopt her, and when she says yes he asks Pepper to marry him and she says yes, and they all live happily ever after. And yes, I absolutely imagine all of this happening with them singing the iconic songs like “Tomorrow” and “ Hard Knock Life”

And someone needs to FREAKING WRITE THIS!!

summary: things i want from avengers: endgame
body:
things i want from avengers: endgame

  • Steve and Clint acting like their comics versions, because the MCU did them so dirty
  • Carol being badass and not being overshadowed by anyone
  • Carol and Thor being F R I E N D S, nothing more
  • Valkyrie being bisexual (for the ones who might argue this doesn’t belong in the movie, put it in an after credits scene or a small happy flirty comment to a girl -cough cough Carol- after they win)
  • Steve’s acknowledgement of his wrongdoings
  • Okoye being badass and having a significant role in all this madness
  • Tony and Rhodey and Pepper seeing each other for the first time in so long and being cute and caring about each other
  • Nebula getting a reunion with her sister
  • Same goes for Peter and Tony
  • And basically everyone who died and everyone who lost someone
  • Very few scenes with Wanda
  • Actual good happy moment between Thor and Loki when they recognise they’ve been fighting for so long and they’re ready to be decent to each other (basically maintaining the dynamic they had in taika’s masterpiece)
  • Pepper being the motherfucking queen of the MCU like she is, keeping everyone in line, scolding everyone when they mess up, and just generally being badass
  • WOMEN BEING AWESOME JUST BECAUSE WE ARE
  • More Bruce x Thor interactions because they are now close and all cute with each other
  • Tony playfully teasing Bruce after the war is over (could be over his crush on Thor, that would be very much acceptable)

summary: dealing with parallel universe chaos: a guide by peter parker
title: dealing with parallel universe chaos: a guide by peter parker
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2JLc9ZW

by devotedcheescake

Six parallel versions of Spider-Man crash into a street when Peter is patrolling, and he has no idea what to do in the situation. Luckily, he has Tony with him, and four friends to text for help. Also, does Spider-Ham sound like John Mulaney?

Words: 1164, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 5 of the avengers assemble groupchat

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man - All Media Types, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse (2018), The Avengers (Marvel Movies), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, The Avengers - Ambiguous Fandom, Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Characters: Shuri (Marvel), Michelle Jones, Peter Parker, Peter B. Parker, Peter Porker, May Parker (Spider-Man), Peni Parker (Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse), Miles Morales, Ned Leeds, Tony Stark, Harley Keener
  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Michelle Jones/Peter Parker, Peter Parker/ MJ, Harley Keener & Peter Parker, Michelle Jones & Harley Keener & Ned Leeds & Peter Parker, Michelle Jones & Ned Leeds & Peter Parker, Peter Parker & Shuri
  • Additional Tags: peter miles and gwen notice that spider ham sounds like john mulaney bc ofc they do, Brooklyn Nine-Nine (TV) References, theres a subtle brooklyn nine nine reference bc i gotta stick to the brand

title: Idiot Friends and Interrupted Kisses
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Fx3Iw0

by thingyoudowiththatthing

After you almost lose your life on a mission you and your best friend Bucky Barnes fess up to having feelings for one another. The confession turns out to be the easy part while it’s gonna take some endurance for the two of you to finally get that first kiss.

Words: 962, Chapters: 1/9, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, You, Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Sam Wilson (Marvel), Vision (Marvel), Wanda Maximoff, Bruce Banner, Hulk (Marvel), Tony Stark, Friday (Marvel), Thor (Marvel)
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Reader
  • Additional Tags: Mission gone bad, Mostly Fluff, idiot friends, Nudity, hinted sexy times, Coitus Interruptus

blog.title: Tony Stark Is Literally My Spirit Animal
blog.description:
Iron dad, Pepperony, and Tony Stark. the others are great too, but just.... Not as great as him.
St*rker is not allowed here. So don't even bother ya nasties

summary:
Peter: Mr. Stark. All these bad things keep happening to me... like I have bad luck or something.
Tony: You don’t have bad luck....
body:
Peter: Mr. Stark. All these bad things keep happening to me… like I have bad luck or something.

Tony: You don’t have bad luck. These things keep happening because you keep being a dumbass

Tony: Want to know the difference between a Ferrari and an erection?
Stephen:

Stephen:

Tony: I don’t have a Ferrari

summary:
My gift for @hotforcaptaincold 
@ironstrangehaven It won’t link to my giftee! :((
I’ll Throw a Lasso  
Prompt: Tony and Stephen...

blog.name: inesstarkrogers
blog.description: Nessa / 20 / Tony is my heart

summary: Yes, you've got the tallest building in the city with your name splattered on it. Yes, you wear the finest three piece suits in...
body:
Yes, you’ve got the tallest building in the city with your name splattered on it. Yes, you wear the finest three piece suits in the world. Yes, you’ve got a pair of sunglasses for every mood, every color, every event. Yes, you’ve got a house in every corner of this country, not to mention outside of this country. Yes, you’ve got nice cars to decorate those houses and awe the people. Yes, your blood isn’t red, it’s green cause you’re a rich boy, through and through.

But let’s not forget this: Yes, your chest is filled with fathom shards of pain. Yes, your tears soak your pillow at night. Yes, your sunglasses hide away the hurt and the sleepless nights. Yes, you put on nice suits in hopes it disguises the mess in you. Yes, your hands tremble too much. Yes, the cold has become too much. Yes, you’re fatherless. Yes, you’re an orphan, not once, but thrice. Yes, you gave them a home and they left you behind. Yes, you’re all alone. Yes.

Yes, yes, yes, yes, yes, yes!

Yes! You’re dirty rich in money and sins, but you’re rich in hurt, tears, trauma, betrayal, mistrust, miscommunications, screams, death, death, death.

Merchant of death and you have yet to profit from all the times you have died.

Summary:

Steve is doing just fine nursing a painful crush on his most captivating client. That is, until his babysitter has an emergency and drops Steve’s six-year-old daughter off at his work. Somehow, everything goes off the rails.

blog.name: tinydragontony
blog.title: TinyDragonTony
blog.description: This is a side blog dedicated to the frostrion fanfiction "Adventures of Tiny Dragon Tony and His Treasure (Loki)" found on AO3. Simply put, I don't have time to write full length fanfics so I want to compile a collection of snapshots into the lives of tiny dragon Tony and his ever sweet yet mischievous lover Loki. So, if that tickles your fancy, why not give us a follow? Or, better yet, follow us on AO3 for update notifications!

title: Sick Days
body:
Loki tosses another tissue onto his nightstand with a pathetic sniffle, adding to the ever-growing pile. Stupid Midgard with their stupiddiseases. He sighs and settles back into his pillow with a petulant frown, drawing the duvet up under his chin. His eyes begin to droop again and just as he is about to doze off, a soft voice calls his name from the other side of the room. Loki groans and blinks in the direction the voice came from, relaxing when he spots Tony poking his head in through their bedroom door.

“How ya doin’, Lokes?”

As Tony pushes his way into the room, careful of the tinkling tray in his hands, Loki shrugs, keen to appear unruffled by the illness but the motion causes a tickle in his throat and he covers his mouth with his arm as he hacks up a lung. It is a few moments more before Loki regains his breath, but there is a significant wheezing quality to it that sets Tony on edge. And, as he draws closer to their bed, Tony’s gaze is immediately drawn to the dark circles under Loki’s eyes, then to the pale sallowness of his cheeks, conscious that the healthier flush they had earlier that morning has now faded. Tony worries his bottom lip between his teeth. “You really are down in the dumps, aren’t you?”

Loki makes no answer and instead sniffles again, eyes drifting down to the tray in Tony’s hands.

“Oh, um, yeah, I made you chicken noodle soup. Or, well, JARVIS ordered some since I can’t cook, but you know that already…” Despite his obvious fatigue, Tony can clearly see amusement light up Loki’s eyes, so he continues to ramble as he sits next to Loki’s side. “Chicken soup is really good for the soul, you know. There was a book about it and everything. And it really does help.” He helps Loki sit up before setting the tray on his lap. “Now, kinda lean over it. Yeah, just like that. And breathe in the steam, uh-huh. JARVIS said that can help loosen things up, and maybe help speed up the getting better process just a little bit.” Tony rubs gentle circles on the back of Loki’s hand but starts as Loki pulls his hand away to pick up the spoon. “Need help?”

Loki shakes his head with a weak laugh, but, again, it becomes clear that help is definitely needed as more soup ends up spilled on the tray than stays in the spoon. It is clear that Loki is frustrated so Tony silently shifts closer and wraps his fingers around Loki’s trembling hand, gently guiding the spoon from the bowl to Loki’s mouth. He grins as Loki takes his first sip, a sigh escaping him.

“Good?”

Loki nods.

Tony spends the next ten minutes feeding Loki, warmth blooming in his chest as he watches Loki struggle to keep his eyes open long enough to finish his soup, but he finally manages it. Tony sets the tray on the nightstand, nudging Loki’s tissues to the side, and turns back to help Loki lie back down. He makes sure Loki is completely settled before bending down to kiss his forehead. “Get some rest, love, and I’ll have tea prepared for when you wake up.” He grins as Loki nods, his eyes already drooping, and Tony can’t resist kissing him once more before standing to tuck the covers around him.

Flicking the lights off, Tony backs out of the room and closes the door on Loki’s soft snores.

Miss the more dragon side of Tony? Find him here!:

https://archiveofourown.org/works/17533676/chapters/41312006
